author: Damien Walsh
comment: Very nice watch face. I like the idea mentioned about having coloured dots or ticks for hours 3, 6, 9 and 12. I have the option of using the GPS or network for weather, It would be good if the watch decided if the GPS was on it would use that, if not then it would use the network. I am also seeing a long string of random numbers instead of the temperature on the Sony Smartwatch 3. I am not keen on the colour schemes. The only reason that I don't use this generally is that the ambient mode looks blocky.

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: We are looking into adding lots of features including the ones that you have mentioned.  Note the random numbers happens rarely due to weather server not our app.  It will go away and should not happen again.

title: Nice design but has issues

author: Tony Atzen
comment: Some more tweaks would be nice. Like an option to make the dials linear. I am not a fan of the thick to thin shape. Also being able to change color or remove the gray circle around the middle would be nice. At last the brightness in ambient mode. I am guessing it's not possible to make it brighter, but if it is, that would be a nice option to have. Btw, it looks like the red preset have the weather icon in a slight more dull red than the rest.
title: Different yet beautiful... But

author: Augustinas Kamicaitis
comment: It looks very nice, haven't found anything similar or cool lucking yet. But for a paid watch face it's lacking a lot of things. Things I would like to see: other date formats, not a fan of the current one. Haven't seen it show weather a single time, it's either a bunch of random numbers or it an error picture. Would be neat to have different configurations for always on face and the active one. A few different stiles, the middle circle looks odd to me.
title: Need for customization options

author: Josh Eidenberg
comment: The UX on the watch to change the watch face is so stupid. Please make an app on the phone to do this. Would have been so much easier
title: Make an app

author: Gregory Asher
comment: When opening the menu on the phone to fine tune options it just opens to a empty screen. Additionally cannot seem to change any settings on the watch itself.
title: Unable to change settings

author: Joseph Harvieux
comment: I really think it's a great looking watch face, but the date and battery data just clutters the face. Would be nice to be able to move them up to the top.
title: Nice Looking, Needs More

author: Daniel Hahn
comment: It looks good but it is buggy which makes it difficult to personalize. Otherwise I would rate this watch face higher.
title: Good

author: Hunter Dinh
comment: Nothing much to say other than I'm very pleased with the update :)

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Please update to 1.5 - The gauge color ring can be changed now.  Along with this Major update: 1) Improved ambient with colors, choose light colors for better result. 2) Improve memory/battery use 3) Redesign day mode 4)fixed hour and minute hand lag when changing colors.

title: Great App!

author: munish kewalramani
comment: Dear Developer,  Would request you to refund my amount since this watch face doesn't works properly. I am not satisfied with this watch face.  Thanks. I am uninstalling it.

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: No worries.  When uninstalled your account is refunded.

author: Andrei Melencu
comment: Very difficult to customize anything. Settings screen exits after each item I try to set. Most of the times the setting is not saved.

author: Steve Marsh
comment: Very fast help, manual location would be better.

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: If you already have "Android Wear", then you may need to "resync" the app.  if not, you download and use Android Wear for all watch faces.  Note that "Android Wear" is a Google's app. All watch faces need it to work.  Please read and follow the instructions before rating.

title: Works great

author: Leo Castro
comment: Dear developer, please allow us to customize the color of the middle gray circle!

author: Alan L
comment: Thirded for the suggested hour dots, tick marks, numbers.  Otherwise, great design, great customizability, good on the battery. Thanks!
title: Great

author: Danny Roque
comment: Superb very elegant design great job thanks.
title: Beautiful watch face

author: Kenneth O
comment: Looked cool. Not working at all, was looking forward to checking it out.

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Please send us the error number.  We can check on the error and fix it for you.  My email is themes.designer2@gmail.com

author: John Ireland
comment: Very nice. Crisp and clean!
title: Nice display

author: Shane B.
comment: Love the customization options. Using with my LG Urbane.
title: Dope.

author: Sean Dexter
comment: Nice uncomplicated design

author: MGV Production
comment: I love it

author: Juan du Toit
comment: So,... after some instruction from the Dev, I now see MY mistake. Still my Fave and wont change until Ameri watch face does the same as glowsticks in terms of options. Great work and thank you for your efficient and suberb work

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: New update: 1.11- Improved color presets and make customization seamlessly.  Note: We improved on the custom mode.  Now, you can over-ride the presets with your own color.  More improvements are coming.  Ameri Watch Face is update is uploaded.  Hope you like it when you see the update.

author: David Traumann
comment: Rating up to 5 stars now since the last update fixed pretty much all of the problems I had before. Nice work developers. Keep up the good work.

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Thank you.  We try our best to satisfy everyone's request.

title: Works great after the update

author: Jeremiah Guffey
comment: I am really enjoying this new watch face. I understand the design is geared towards being a minimalist look, however I have a suggestion for some possible future features: could you add in showable/hideable hour tick marks? Something as simple as dots at 3,6,9 and 12 would look great I think. Also allow them to be colored and this watch would be perfect! Keep up the excellent work!

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Thank you for the suggestion.  We have considered that idea.  We will revisit it.

title: Excellent

author: Andrew Sc
comment: Love the design, but i experience constant bugs after updates. I wish this app just stays the same, with no further updates. After the last update the weather icon is always blue (for some reason), and there is no custom option to match the rest of the colors. I was quite happy with the previous iteration.

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: This update is for you Andrew 1.11 has - Improved color presets and make customization seamlessly.  Note: We improved on the custom mode.  Now, you can over-ride the presets with your own color.  More improvements are coming.

title: Nice design but buggy

author: Eric Siebert
comment: Is there an option to not have the hands dim in ambient mode?

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Hi Eric, update to the latest version 10.  This is a major update that we have been working the past month.  We added New Presets (10), Glow Color to date, Temperature, and battery.  We updated the weather icon to match.  We will check out if there's a way to give you the option to not have hands dim in ambient.

title: Works good

author: Erick Ramirez
comment: Nice, clean and customizable watch face! Lots of cool color combinations! I'm rocking all cyan with a red seconds hand. Only complaint is the font for the date and battery, a cleaner one can be used imo.

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Please update to version 1.10.  We have been working the past month to bring you this update. We added New Presets (10 more).  Glow to features, change to weather to match face.  More to come.  Keep the ideas feedback coming, we will consider adding more fonts.  Note: Choose "CUSTOM" preset if you want to customize each item on watch.

title: Elegant watch face!

author: Andrew Ledoux
comment: I had an issue opening on my LG g watch.  That updated software within 1 day.  Awesome!

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Thank you Andrew.  We always strive to make the app better for our customers.

title: Fixed app within 1 day

author: Antony Wang
comment: Cool design. But it drains battery. Definitely a five-star app if battery drain issue is fixed.

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Please update to version 1.10.  We have been working the past month to bring you this update. We added New Presets (10 more).  Glow to features, weather icon to match, fix weather bug.  More to come.  Keep the ideas feedback coming.  Note: Choose "CUSTOM" preset if you want to customize each item on watch.

title: Good looking watch face

author: Chris Kane
comment: Perfect, kudos to the dev!

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Please update to version 1.10.  We added New Presets (10 more).  Glow to features, weather icon to match, fix weather bug.  More to come.  Keep the ideas feedback coming.  Note: Choose "CUSTOM" preset if you want to customize each item on watch.

title: Perfect!!!

author: Ademir Džuzdanović
comment: Amazing feedback from the developer! The last 2 updates made this watch face even more perfect. Keep up the great work! Just one small bug that I found, the "half moon" icon in ambient mode for weather is cut in half. Just to a minor visual bug.

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Update 1.6 - improve battery life by 30%. The minor bug fix requested is included in this 1.5 - 1) Improved ambient with colors, choose light colors for better result. 2) Improve memory/battery use 3) Added color picker for Widget (date and battery), most watch parts now can be customized. 4) Redesign day mode

title: Now you deserve more than 5 stars!

author: Paul Z
comment: One of my favorite faces

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Update 1.6 - improve battery life by 30%.  1.5 - Major update:  1) Improved ambient with colors, choose light colors for better result. 2) Improve memory/battery use  3)  Added color picker for Widget (date and battery), most watch parts now can be customized. 4) Redesign day mode 5)fixed hour and minute hand lag when changing colors.

author: Jaimin Bhatt
comment: The initial settings were much simpler and better. Now it's too complicated to always have to set each color... You could provide presets. Also give ability to reset to default...

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Your request to update with preset is now done.  Please update to version 1.10.  There are even more to come.

title: Made it too complicated!

author: Esbjörn T
comment: Great look overall but I'd like the ability to customise more on the ambient screen (hands only and larger) and also to completely disable the faux Chrome ring since this looks bad on the LG R which already has a metal ring..

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Please update to ver 1.6 - improve battery life.  1) Improved ambient with colors, choose light colors for better result. 2) Improve memory/battery use 3) Added color picker for Widget (date and battery), most watch parts now can be customized. 4) Redesign day mode 5)fixed hour and minute hand lag when changing colors.

title: Need more...

author: Jim Mars
comment: Great watch face,  just remember to tap the watch face in the Android wear app on the phone to change the settings instead of using the settings on the watch itself.

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Thank you. FYI:  1.5 - Major update: 1) Improved ambient with colors, choose light colors for better result. 2) Improve memory/battery use 3) Added color picker for Widget (date and battery), most watch parts now can be customized. 4) Redesign day mode 5)fixed hour and minute hand lag when changing colors.

title: Great watch face

author: Jeremy Smith
comment: Can't  open the app

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Give more details please so I can help you.  Also, you can email me at ten.Designer@gmail.com.  I haven't heard from you, please update to version 1.3 and make sure you have "android Wear" and a compatible watch.  Thank you.

title: Can't  open the app

author: mark greentree
comment: Love the watch face, just wish the date could glow like the battery meter. But still a great job, thanks. Update.. Great response as always from the Dev, all issues resolved. Now a well deserved 5 stars

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Please update to ver 1.6 - improve battery life.more options and choices =)  I have not forgotten about your glowing date/battery meter - it's not doable yet.  Will keep trying.

title: LG R

comment: If anything, I'd have a plain black background but I'm happy with it just the way it is.
title: Simple and beautiful

author: Marcus Wilson
comment: It LOOKED like it was going to be a really sleek black background but it isnt.  Times out too quick and the ambient mode is hideous.  I had high hopes.

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Please update to v1.10 - Improve ambient mode, fixed weather bug, added glow - now you can hide or show battery and date gauge backgrounds with the same selection "Widget Gauges" - Hide.  The app is now updated with nice ambient mode, infinity color pickers for hands, temperature, weather, battery indicator and date...  Enjoy

title: Lack of options

author: Lex Burbury
comment: Paid for the install and it didn't work, tried to reinstall no luck.  No refund either so good luck.

reply.author: THAAUS
reply.content: Hi Lex, my email is themes.designer2@gmail.com.  please send the order number and i will take care of you.

author: Resh christi
comment: Cannot access it useless app
